title: About
text: I am a researcher focusing on blockchain-based open-source innovation, particularly how token-based incentives shape collaboration patterns and ecosystem evolution. This website will gradually include working papers, datasets, and notes.

title: Shang Jing
text:
Shang Jing
Graduate Researcher
Email: you@example.com
GitHub: https://github.com/jing1201121


Research Focus
My research explores blockchain-based open-source innovation systems, with a particular focus on how protocol-level incentive design shapes developer collaboration and value distribution across ecosystems such as Ethereum.
Keywords - Open-source collaboration structures - Protocol governance - Token economy and value allocation - Multi-chain ecosystem evolution
